mng: to wind, to coil (thread), to rotate around, to spiral, to move around, to go round (an obstacle), to by-pass, to make a detour, to confuse, to perplex
variant of 繞|绕[rao4], to rotate around, to spiral, to move around, to go round (an obstacle), to by-pass, to make a detour

to linger on, to hover, to encircle
to curl up, to linger on (sound)
twisting, to twine, to wind, to pester, to bother
to surround, to circle, to revolve around
to detour, to bypass, to circumvent, to avoid, to wind around (of a road etc)
